label: Digital Cameras
description: Devices used to capture and store digital images and videos.
intents: Find the best camera for travel
Convert VHS tapes to digital format

subcategories.label: DSLR Cameras
subcategories.description: Digital single-lens reflex cameras with interchangeable lenses.

subcategories.label: Mirrorless Cameras
subcategories.description: Cameras with interchangeable lenses that do not have a mirror to reflect light into the viewfinder.

subcategories.label: Point-and-Shoot Cameras
subcategories.description: Cameras with fixed lenses and automatic settings.

subcategories.label: Action Cameras
subcategories.description: Cameras designed for capturing action and sports footage.
